description.narrative: By 2021, children, families of communities and institutions (schools and FOSA) in the intervention zones, have functional and accessible drinking water works.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, children, families of communities and institutions (schools and FOSA) in the intervention zones, have functional and accessible drinking water works.

description.narrative: 107,566 people have access to drinking water through community water point construction composed of 57 new water points (41 mechanized boreholes and 16 manual drilling) and the rehabilitation of 167 boreholes. 160 water point management committees were set up or reactivated to ensure adequate management, regular maintenance and community ownership. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:26/12/2019
